snippet: Footage of briefings to the second-highest leadership body revealed the clubby exchanges between the Mormon Church and Mormon politicians....
abstract: Network of disaffected Mormons leaks series of videos showing senior leaders of Mormon Church discussing issues including same-sex marriage, marijuana and Iraq at their Salt Lake City headquarters; videos, which feature briefings from Mormon politicians, raise questions about whether Mormon legislators have inappropriately used their influence to advance church's interests; network found one another on Reddit forums.
lead_paragraph: Footage of briefings to the second-highest leadership body revealed the clubby exchanges between the Mormon Church and Mormon politicians.

headline.main: Leaked Videos Pull Back Curtain on Mormon Leadership
headline.print_headline: Leaked Videos Pull Back Curtain on Workings of Mormon Leadership

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Mormons (Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints)

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
